list.taskList: list-style: none; margin-left: -24px; font-size: 1em; color: #4a4a4a; line-height: 1.8;

code.block: background: #fef7ed; padding: 0.5em 1em 1em; border-radius: 8px; font-size: 14px; font-family: Operator Mono, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; line-height: 1.6; white-space: pre; overflow-x: auto; word-wrap: normal; color: #333; margin: 1.2em 0; border: 1px solid #f5e2c7; box-shadow: 0 2px 4px rgba(197,117,18,0.05); width: 100%;
code.inline: background: #fef7ed; padding: 2px 6px; border-radius: 4px; color: #333; font-size: 14px; font-family: Operator Mono, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; border: 1px solid #f5e2c7;

styles.quote: border-left: 4px solid #c57512; border-radius: 6px; padding: 16px 20px; background: #fef7ed; margin: 0.8em 0; color: #8b6d4d; font-style: italic; font-size: 1em; word-wrap: break-word;
styles.image: max-width: 100%; height: auto; margin: 1em auto; display: block;

table.container: width: 100%; margin: 1em 0; border-collapse: collapse; border: 1px solid #f5e2c7;
table.header: background: #fef7ed; font-weight: bold; color: #c57512; border-bottom: 2px solid #f5e2c7; font-size: 1em;
